posts.caption: Human Resources Management
posts.description:
HRM Workshop for Entry Level - 6 Days
Agenda: 
- Human Resources Management Problems in Egypt 
- Human Capital 
- HRM Career path
- Organization structure
- What Everyone Should Know about Job Analysis 
. Uses of job analysis
. Methods of collecting job analysis information
. Job description
. Job Specification 
-Training process and Development 
. Training process
. Training methods
.  Evaluating the training effort
- Recruitment and Selection process. 
.Recruitment plan 
. Recruitment Problems 
. Interview 
. Types of Interview 
. Types of Questions
- Performance management 
. Why do we need performance management?
. Steps of Performance management.
. Formal methods of Performance appraisal.
- Compensation and Benefits
-----------------------------------
Time:
Saturday 03/09 from 11:00AM to 04:00PM 
(every saturday for 6 weeks)

-----------------------------------
Trainer:

Aya Samir 
- HR trainer and Consultant

- Human Resources Practical Diploma From AUC 
- Master in labor & social low from Cairo University
- MBA from garden York from New York 
- HRBP (human resources business professional) from HRCI (human resources certificates institute )

-----------------------------------

posts.message:
سؤال بخصوص أباتشي سيرفر و SSL
محتاج أعمل الموقع بتاعي https وعندي ssl certificate، وهي شغالة على port معين (مثلا https://champolu.net:80/)، لكن المطلوب إني أعمل redirect/rewrite بحيث  إن لما أكتب champolu.net يدخلني على طول على الـ https مع الـ port

دلوقتي حاولت كذا حاجة، مثلا:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/17853828/redirecting-http-to-https-with-apache

فالحاجات دي لازم تتغير في الـ config file بتاع أباتشي.

عشان أتأكد من الفايل اللي بيتخدم، دورت عليه بالطريقة دي:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12202021/where-is-my-httpd-conf-file-located-apache

فغيرتها، لكن لسبب ما، مفيش ريدايركت بيحصل- قلت احتمال يكون في حاجة بتعمل 
AllowOverride None
فخليتها كلها
AllowOverride all

مش عارف لسة ألاقي حل ...

 حد عنده أي فكرة إزاي أعمل debugging للمشكلة دي عشان أعرف ليه الريدايركت مش شغال؟

Affectiva is looking to hire a lead software engineer!

If you're interested to work in a very exciting AI startup, Affectiva is growing and looking for top Machine Learning Engineers and Software Engineers on various levels to work in an international team, in Cairo (located in Tagamo3 Al Khames) and Boston. Apply below.
It's a very attractive opportunity in terms of learning, career prospects and compensation. Feel free to share with your friends.
